name: Mind Flayer Arcanist
skills: Arcana +7, Deception +6, Insight +6, Perception +6, Persuasion +6, Stealth +4

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The mind flayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics).
descriptions: The mind flayer's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

descriptions.raw: 1/day each: dominate monster, plane shift (self only)
descriptions.hyperlinked: 1/day each: dominate monster, plane shift (self only)

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The mind flayer has the following wizard spells prepared:

descriptions.raw: * Cantrips (at will): blade ward, dancing lights, mage hand, shocking grasp
descriptions.hyperlinked: * Cantrips (at will): blade ward, dancing lights, mage hand, shocking grasp

descriptions.raw: * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, disguise self, shield, sleep
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, disguise self, shield, sleep

descriptions.raw: * 2nd level (3 slots): blur, invisibility, ray of enfeeblement
descriptions.hyperlinked: * 2nd level (3 slots): blur, invisibility, ray of enfeeblement

descriptions.raw: * 3rd level (3 slots): clairvoyance, lightning bolt, sending
* 5th level (2 slots): telekinesis, wall of force

actions.name: Tentacles.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the mind flayer. Hit: The target takes 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (Recharge 5-6).
descriptions: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
